title: Introduction
description: The Finnish War (1808–1809). Establish the historical context, the tensions between Sweden and the Russian Empire, and the situation in Finland.

panels.description: Wide map of the Finnish war

title: Scene – Slaget vid Jutas (13 September 1808)
description: Introduction of the main commanders and opposing forces preparing for confrontation near Jutas, south of Nykarleby.

panels.description: Character gallery montage: Swedish leaders on left, Russian on right; Jutas landscape faintly behind.

title: Retreat from Vasa
description: The Swedish army retreats from Vasa to Nykarleby under pressure from advancing Russian forces. The soldiers are exhausted but determined.
scene: A column of weary soldiers marches through muddy roads bordered by autumnal fields. Wagons creak, smoke rises in the far distance. Döbeln rides beside the column, his expression set with resolve.

panels.description: Top wide: Tired column trudging through mud; wagons and drifting smoke on horizon.
Bottom wide: Döbeln on horseback alongside the ranks; officers confer briefly as rain spits.

title: Döbeln Sick in Nykarleby
description: Döbeln lies in bed, weakened by fever and a head wound. Despite illness, he continues to command and issue orders from his quarters in Nykarleby.
scene: Interior of a dimly lit wooden house in Nykarleby. Döbeln lies in bed, pale and sweating, his black headband beside him. Papers and maps scatter the table as an aide and a young messenger await his orders.

panels.description: Close on Döbeln in bed; bandage and black headband on table edge.
Aide spreads maps and dispatches; candlelight pools on inked notes.
Close up Döbelns face. Determined
Döbeln dictates orders, finger tracing a route toward Jutas on the map.

title: March to Jutas
description: The Swedish troops march toward Jutas. Döbeln, pale but resolute, rides before his soldiers on horseback, overseeing the preparation of defensive positions in Jutas.
scene: Afternoon sunlight glints off bayonets as soldiers march through open countryside. Döbeln, back on horseback, raises his sword slightly in salute as his men cheer. In the distance, Jutas is visible.

panels.description: Top wide: Jutas, river and road
Bottom wide: Döbeln salutes from horseback as men cheer; officers point out defensive ground.

title: Battle Begins
description: The Russian vanguard attacks the Swedish front line. The Swedes withdraw in good order toward the main force near Jutas.
scene: Early afternoon. Musket fire flashes through drifting smoke. Swedish skirmishers fall back toward the main position. The Jutas road curves behind them, half-obscured by gunpowder haze.

panels.description: Skirmishers fire from fence line; first puffs of white smoke.
Signal to fall back; men peel off in pairs down the Jutas road.
Russian vanguard pushes through gaps, bayonets low.
Döbeln observed in the distance, steadying the line with a raised hand.

title: Russian Advance
description: The Russian troops advance steadily toward the Swedish positions, their numbers pressing hard against the defenders.
scene: Rows of Russian infantry march forward through smoke and broken fences. Their officers shout orders as musket balls strike the ground

panels.description: Top wide: Dense Russian ranks moving through smoke and splintered fencing.
Bottom wide: Swedish defenders brace behind a low ridge; earth spatters with impacts.

title: Counterfire Ordered
description: Von Döbeln orders concentrated artillery and musket fire. Swedish gunners and infantry respond with disciplined volleys.
scene: Döbeln raises his sword on horseback, the signal for counterfire. Cannons thunder in unison; flashes illuminate smoke clouds. A moment of controlled chaos — soldiers working in rhythm, faces lit by firelight.

panels.description: Döbeln’s sword raised—the signal; aides relay the command.
Artillery battery fires; recoil and flame tongues burst from muzzles.
Infantry volley in line; synchronized smoke wall rolling forward.

title: Exchange of Fire
description: The Russians spread out and return heavy fire. Both sides suffer casualties amid cannon smoke and shouted commands.
scene: Thick smoke covers the field. Soldiers reload under fire, gun barrels glowing. The air is filled with thunder and shouting.

panels.description: Russian line returns fire; officers gesture for wider frontage.
Swedish infantry reload hastily behind smoke; ramrods flash.
Fallen and wounded between lines; stretcher men crouch low.
Artillery crew swabs and rams; sparks shower from the vent.

title: Swedish Push Forward
description: The Swedish line surges ahead amid loud cries of ‘Hurrah!’. Döbeln rallies his men from horseback as the Russians begin to falter and withdraw under pressure.
scene: Late afternoon golden light cuts through the smoke. Döbeln, sword raised, rides ahead as his men charge with loud hurrahs. The Russians begin to fall back, banners torn, smoke glowing orange.

panels.description: Döbeln rallies the line; riders wheel along the front.
Swedish charge—bayonets forward; ‘Hurrah!’ mouths open.
Russian ranks buckle; officers try to steady a ragged line.
Torn banner recedes into smoke as the retreat begins.

title: Aftermath
description: Döbeln walks across the battlefield among the dead and wounded. The Swedish troops have held their ground, but at a heavy cost.
scene: Evening dusk. The field is silent except for groans and the rustle of crows. Döbeln, dismounted, walks through the bodies, his uniform stained with smoke. Field surgeons kneel beside wounded men near small campfires.

panels.description: Top wide: Döbeln walks among bodies and abandoned gear at dusk.
Bottom wide: Surgeons tend the wounded by low firelight; officers confer quietly.

title: Modern Time
description: A high-school teacher stands before the Jutas monument with her students, recounting the events of 1808 and Döbeln’s leadership.
scene: Present day. Bright daylight at the Jutas monument surrounded by birch trees. A teacher gestures toward the bronze relief of Döbeln, while students listen quietly — the past and present united in the same landscape.

panels.description: Wide shot of Jutas monument and birches; teacher addresses attentive students.
